text.p: Does every list of two non-zero vectors in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline] span [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline]?

font.p: If the two vectors are scalar multiples of each other, then they lie along the same line, and their span cannot include anything off that line. For instance, in the following picture, [mathjaxinline]w[/mathjaxinline] is not a linear combination of [mathjaxinline]v_1[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]v_2[/mathjaxinline], so [mathjaxinline]w[/mathjaxinline] is not in the span of [mathjaxinline]\{ v_1; v_2\}[/mathjaxinline] – the list does not span all of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline].
